IX.iii.1.D.3.f
.
Proportional IVAP Award Entries
When the proportionate IVAP provides the greater benefit from the effective date to the end of the initial year
use the proportionate IVAP as the award line IVAP
enter the proportionate IVAP as other annual income on the financial screen which corresponds to the initial award line, and
annotate the award to indicate that a proportional IVAP was used.
Note
:  The first award line of the next calendar year must show the actual expected income.
